{{Quote|[[The Stranger]] finds what he's been searching for. [[Arondir]] and [[Isildur]] search for [[Theo]]. [[Galadriel]] and [[Elrond]] walk into a trap.|Official Synopsis, [[Amazon Studios]]}}

'''Eldest''' is the twelfth episode of [[Amazon Studios]]'s television series, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''. It is the fourth episode of the second season and it was released on [[5 September]], [[2024]].

== Trivia ==
Below is a list of trivia from Amazon's "X-Ray" feature that accompanied the episode.
